definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: So you testify against yourselves that you are the descendants of those who murdered the prophets.
sentences.chinese: 這就是你們自己證明，是殺害先知者的子孫了。

sentences.english: No animal must ever kill any other animal.
sentences.chinese: 任何動物不得殺害別的動物。

sentences.english: If the scourge slay suddenly, he will laugh at the trial of the innocent.
sentences.chinese: 若忽然遭殺害之禍，他必戲笑無辜的人遇難。

sentences.english: They are killing older people now in Prussia, they buried them up in the forest.
sentences.chinese: 在普拉斯左營，他們正殺害老人，然後埋在森林裏。

sentences.english: Roman soldiers had killed some Galileans who had been offering sacrifices.
sentences.chinese: 羅馬士兵殺害了一些獻祭的加利利人。

sentences.english: He wanted to avenge the death of his younger brother, who had been killed by Vishnu.
sentences.chinese: 他想爲遭毗溼奴殺害的弟弟報仇。

sentences.english: The police are always hounding me.
sentences.chinese: 警方正在追捕殺害她的兇手。

sentences.english: The killings are brutal, with victims ritually tortured.
sentences.chinese: 受害者通常在遭受儀式性的折磨之後被殘酷殺害。

sentences.english: Yan Yan sees in the factory a man is killing a girl.
sentences.chinese: 燕燕在工廠看到一個男子正在殺害一個女孩。

sentences.english: Most were killed in gas chambers.
sentences.chinese: 大部分都是在毒氣室裏面被殺害的。

sentences.english: Write in Oedipus tracking down before the king the murderer killed a center events.
sentences.chinese: 中寫俄狄浦斯追查殺害前王兇手這一中心事件。

sentences.english: Every year, there are an estimated 31 000 homicide deaths in children under 15.
sentences.chinese: 每年估計有31000名15歲以下兒童被殺害。

sentences.english: Jean got life imprisonment for killing the policeman.
sentences.chinese: 簡因殺害那個警察被判處無期徒刑。

sentences.english: Severwouls soldiers haudio-videoe long nevertheless been killed in the conflict.
sentences.chinese: 在爭論中依然有幾名兵士被殺害。

sentences.english: I play judge, jury, convict and victim.
sentences.chinese: 我扮演着法官，陪同審判團，罪犯和遭到殺害者。

sentences.english: I saw my husband murdered before me.
sentences.chinese: 我眼看着我的丈夫被殺害。

definition: to beat up/to come to blows/battery (law)
to monitor/to keep a close watch over/surveillance
an execution/to put sb to death
to shoot dead (with a gun, or bow and arrow)
to expose/to bring to light/to disclose/revelation
